title: 14 day ban appeal
body:
Hi Riot,

I recently downloaded LoL, and I've since played 2 games. Being a beginner, I got absolutely crushed both times. When I re-opened the game for a third game, it told me that I was banned for disruptive behaviour. I wasn't trying to lose.. Im just terrible. can it lifted?

thanks, Sam

replies.body:
If you wish to appeal a punishment you can do so via Player Support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you want feeback on a punishment, I would recommend you post your reform card (the pop-up in-client that indicates you have been banned). Every ban case is unique, so there isn't much to be said without knowing exactly why you were banned, and what you were banned for.
